text: Hello everyone. I am new to Slack, I hope I can solve my queries here with the help of awesome HubSpot developers. Actually I am working on a blog template for some days. I have two different templates for listing page and post page and I have to render a number from post page to listing page. I have kept that number in a text field in post page. How can I display that number in my listing page?
Hello, I'm looking for an example for bulk importing deals (via a CSV file) with an associated company for each deal. Anyone have an idea where I might find that? Thank!
